item.title: Micosoft Azure Blob Container
item.description: Micosoft Azure Blob Container About Microsoft Azure Blob Containers Azure Blob storage is Microsoft’s object storage solution for the cloud that is optimized for storing massive amounts of unstructured data. Unstructured data is data that doesn’t adhere to a particular data model or definition, such as text or binary data. Azure Storage is a Microsoft-managed service that provides highly available, secure, durable, and scalable cloud storage. This page describes how to set up your own Azure Blob Container as a custom storage for Cloudback backups.
